Paragraph: The increased J sc of PIDT-C12NT may be also attributed to the enhanced film absorption coefficient so that more sunlight can be absorbed and then generate more excitons , finally produce more charges.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The increased J sc of PIDT-C12NT may be also attributed to the enhanced film absorption coefficient so that more sunlight can be absorbed and then generate more excitons , finally produce more charges.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J sc (Joule scatter) |
| PIDT-C12NT |
| film absorption coefficient |
| sunlight |
| excitons |
| charges |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J sc (Joule scatter) |
| film absorption coefficient |
| excitons |

Note: "PIDT-C12NT" is not a material property, it is a specific material or compound mentioned in the paragraph. Therefore, it was not included in the table. Additionally, "so that more sunlight can be absorbed" and "finally produce more charges" are not material properties, they are descriptions of what happens as a result of the material properties mentioned.
